thread.title: Québec City to welcome 500 Canadian event industry professionals in 2019
thread.title_full: Québec City to welcome 500 Canadian event industry professionals in 2019

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Québec City to welcome 500 Canadian event industry professionals in 2019
text:
Québec City to welcome 500 Canadian event industry professionals in 2019 Québec City to welcome 500 Canadian event industry professionals in 2019 Details Category: Venues & Events   10:30 The PCMA Canada East Chapter has announced the locations of its future Canadian Innovation Conferences and Québec City is on the list. From November 17 to 19, 2019, the Québec City Convention Centre and Hilton Québec will host the 7th edition of the Canadian Innovation Conference (CIC). 
Some 500 event industry professionals from across the country are expected at this conference dedicated to new ideas and networking. Québec City will welcome conference, meeting, show, and exhibition planners. They will have ample opportunity to appreciate everything that Québec City has to offer as a business destination. PCMA (Professional Convention Management Association) numbers over 6,000 members representing event industry leaders from around the globe, and has 17 chapters in the United States, Canada, and Mexico.
